QAPair.Question: What is (are) Cancer - resources ?
QAPair.Answer: The following organizations are good resources for information on cancer : American Cancer Society -- www.cancer.org , American Childhood Cancer Organization -- www.acco.org , Cancer Care -- www.cancercare.org , Cancer.Net -- www.cancer.net/coping-with-cancer/finding-support-and-information/general-cancer-groups , Centers for Disease Control and Prevention -- www.cdc.gov/cancer , National Cancer Institute -- www.cancer.gov , US National Library of Medicine, MedlinePlus -- medlineplus.gov/cancer.html ,
